thread.title: Martin DMcMillian
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Martin DMcMillian

author: Martin DMcMillian
title: Martin DMcMillian
text: Excellent job by the florist ! My lady friend was very impressed by the arrangement as the flowers came into full bloom in her home! Only complaint, delivery was after dark and left on the front door step . She doesn't use the front door and didn't find them . I called her and told her to look around outside. Overall a great job and it showed in the , love in bloom presentation !
